Ist zwar einbisschen Beginner unfriendly aber sobald man den Dreh raus hat macht das Spiel super viel Spa√ü. Man kann sowohl Survivor als auch Killer spielen. Multiplayer gibt es auch bei dem Spiel, was meiner Meinung nach am meisten Spa√ü macht.

After this update I have to change my review to negative as a long time player on console and pc. The devs have always made it a point to Patch anything fun in this game first vs fixing the real issues. Not to mention there is no casual mode so if you are good at the game you'll be penalized for such as deranking takes to long and you get a 5 minute ban for dcing. I personally feel the only reason they got rid of mods is because they did a better job than the devs did and only using blender and youtube tutorials. Do not play this game in it's current state. When it's fixed I'll update the review. For now go play Dead By Roblox as it's actually fun compared to this.

This game has quite a toxic community, but it's still addictive as hell, so I definitely recommend giving it at least a try.

To sum it up, DbD is an asymmetrical horror game where four players, the survivors, need to escape from a fifth player, the camper. To accomplish this they have to hold the left mouse button, while scouting for the camper. The camper‚Äôs task is just as simple; they have to find a survivor and put them on a meat hook- then proceed to read them a fairytale while you both hang out. It is also customary to take a swing at the hooked survivor, as a sign of good sportsmanship.
The other survivors may try to unhook you and should they succeed, the camper will promptly put you back on the hook.

This cycle continues until either there are no more survivors or until the survivors have held their left mouse button long enough and lived. Then the match ends and everyone partakes in a friendly chat where they share some encouraging words and helpful tips and tricks. 

To keep the game from feeling stale after nearly five long years, the developer continuously whip up some new survivors, campers, bugs, maps and useless perks to add to the game, as well as holding events fairly frequently. 

Now, I am a bit torn on whether I should recommend it or not. If you like asymmetrical gameplay, then there aren‚Äôt many options out there, and DbD might still be the better one. However, many have complain that the game is unbalanced, which I wouldn‚Äôt say it is, rather, it‚Äôs the matchmaking that needs an overhaul. I also mentioned that this game is a horror game, however it is only as scary as the classic 80s slasher movies that inspired it ‚Äì which is; not at all. Speaking of, the game also boast a large number of licensed campers from said movies (or their recent reboot cousins with cheaper licensing).

While I‚Äôm on the fence on whether this game is good or not, I‚Äôll still give it a thumbs-up ‚Äì but only because there aren‚Äôt many games like it out there and the developer, however arrogant, are still supporting the game.

Bottom line, if this sounds like something you‚Äôd enjoy, then you‚Äôd probably enjoy it... and eventually develop a love/hate relationship, like the rest of us.
a game in the killer fave side everyone

Do not waste your money on a broken game that has no rules. Imagine playing professional basketball with no referee ? Well if you could imagine what that would look like, its this garbage. If you go to play survivor, its toxic mess with so many annoying broken bugs. The Devs constantly acknowledge the issues but choose to focus on cosmetics instead of actual core gameplay. Before anyone says if I play only one side, I play both ! And the Killers deal with just as many broken as bugs this game has to offer. If Bethesda had a cousin, Behavior would be it. Their future goal is the Fortnite goal, skins over everything. If your okay with a game that has tumbled down so far down you'd swear your at the earth's core mantle, something is wrong with you. I've played this game over 6 years and I can truly say this game is a must not play. Let Behavior learn from their greed.

i'm starting to dislike this game more and more. 2 years ago I loved playing this game and lost my motivation more and more. The developers keep adding more and more OP Killers, literally. As an example the Trickster or what they're called. Not only can they literally throw 30 arrow thingies at you, no, they can also one-hit you sometimes which is the most crap. I also think it's stupid that you die directly after you are the last one left and get hung. Like you still have your 3/6 tries to get off sometimes. The other thing bothering me is the fact that you still can't play like that the killer, also befriending, you an survivor and 3 more people from the internet can't play in an online lobby and earn "money". Beside all that crap I really like the game, at least when I can play with my not existing friends-
